meta.title: pulsardata.ai | Enterprise Agentic Solutions Architecture & Implementation
meta.description: Boutique consultancy specializing in agentic AI architecture and implementation for the enterprise. Salesforce expertise, EU AI Act compliance, legacy integration.
meta.ogDescription: Architecture, implementation and compliance of agentic AI solutions. Senior team, pragmatic approach, measurable results.

hero.title: Enterprise Agentic Solutions Architecture & Implementation
hero.subtitle: We design and deploy AI agents that integrate with your existing stack, respect your regulatory constraints, and deliver measurable results.

items.title: Agentic Architecture
items.description: Custom multi-agent system design: orchestration, memory, tools, guardrails. Architectures documented in C4/ArchiMate, ADRs included.

items.title: EU AI Act Compliance
items.description: Risk classification, technical documentation, AI system registry, impact assessment. Audit-ready before the deadline.

items.title: Existing Stack Integration
items.description: Salesforce, SAP, ServiceNow, legacy APIs. Your agents integrate with your IS without disruptive migration or additional tech debt.

items.title: No studies without deliverables
items.description: Every engagement produces code, documented architecture, or a working POC. Zero substance-free slide decks.

items.title: Production-validated architectures
items.description: 18+ years of enterprise IS architecture. Our designs pass architecture reviews, security audits, and scalability constraints.

items.title: Senior team only
items.description: 3 experts, no outsourced juniors. You work directly with the architects who design and implement.

items.title: Automated technical quotation
items.description: Complex quote generation agent integrating BOMs, regulatory constraints, and supplier history.

items.title: Multi-brand GDPR compliance
items.description: Agentic system for monitoring and remediating customer data flows across a group's brands.

items.title: Agentic Salesforce CRM
items.description: Agents integrated with Salesforce for automatic qualification, lead enrichment, and next-best-action recommendations.

items.title: Regulated documentation
items.description: Automated generation and verification of FDA/EMA-compliant documentation with full traceability.

items.title: Intelligent customer service
items.description: Level 1-2 conversational agents with smart escalation, compliant with banking requirements (DORA, MiFID II).

items.title: Agentic data governance
items.description: Cataloging, lineage, and data quality agents, integrated with your existing data management tools.

cta.title: Ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Two ways to get started, zero commitment.

audit.title: Free 30-min audit
audit.description: A technical exchange with a senior architect to evaluate your use case and identify quick wins.

whitepaper.title: Technical white paper
whitepaper.description: "Enterprise Agentic Solutions Architecture" - Patterns, anti-patterns, and implementation guide.

meta.title: Services | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Agentic architecture, POC & implementation, strategic audit, and Salesforce + AI consulting. Transparent pricing.

items.title: Agentic Solutions Architecture
items.what: Custom multi-agent architecture design for your business use cases. From orchestration schemas to guardrail specifications, including framework selection and deployment strategy.

items.title: POC & Implementation
items.what: From proof-of-concept to production. We develop, test, and deploy your AI agents with an iterative approach and deliverables at each sprint.
items.format: POC: 4 to 6 weeks / Full: 2 to 6 months

items.title: Audit & Agentic Strategy
items.what: Assessment of your AI maturity, identification of high-ROI use cases, and implementation roadmap. Includes EU AI Act compliance analysis.

items.title: Salesforce + AI Consulting
items.what: AI agent integration in your Salesforce ecosystem: Agentforce, Einstein, augmented flows, CRM integration with external LLMs.

meta.title: Expertise | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: 18+ years of enterprise IS architecture. Solution Architect, Kering Design Authority, Salesforce and agentic systems expertise.

pascal.name: Pascal Le Clech
pascal.bio: 18+ years of experience in enterprise information systems architecture. Former Design Authority at Kering (Gucci, Saint Laurent, Balenciaga) where he designed and supervised the group's IS architectures. Deep expertise in complex systems integration, API management, and technical governance.

matthieu.name: Matthieu
matthieu.description: Specialized in agentic systems implementation and LLM integration in enterprise architectures.

alexandre.name: Alexandre
alexandre.description: Expert in autonomous agent development, data pipelines, and continuous integration of AI solutions.

meta.title: Approach | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Our 4-phase methodology: discovery, audit, POC, production. Pragmatic approach, concrete deliverables, zero bullshit.

phases.title: Discovery
phases.description: Technical exchange to understand your context, identify use cases, and assess feasibility. No commitment.

phases.title: Audit & Architecture
phases.description: In-depth analysis of your IS, target architecture design, and implementation planning.

phases.title: POC
phases.description: Development of a working proof-of-concept on a limited scope to validate the approach and measure results.

phases.title: Production
phases.description: Full implementation, integration testing, production deployment, and knowledge transfer to your teams.

items.title: Executive sponsor
items.description: An identified decision-maker with the authority to validate directions and unlock resources.

items.title: Approved budget
items.description: An approved and realistic budget relative to the project's ambitions.

items.title: Available teams
items.description: Business and technical contacts accessible for workshops and validations.

items.title: Accessible data
items.description: Access to necessary data and systems, even in a test environment.

meta.title: Contact | pulsardata.ai
meta.description: Contact us for a free audit or a quote request. Response within 24 business hours.
